explains: n. （作物收割后留在地里的）残株；胡子茬，发茬，须茬

sentences.en: His face was covered with the stubble of several nights.
sentences.cn: 他脸上布满了几夜的胡子茬。

sentences.en: His giant face had a rough growth of stubble, his eyes looked dully ahead.
sentences.cn: 他宽大的脸庞上长着粗硬的胡子茬，眼睛黯然无神地看着前方。

sentences.en: The stubble was burning in the fields.
